senses.sense_definition: An abbreviation for <w>question</w> and <w>answer</w>, typically referring to a structured period where an audience asks questions to a speaker.

examples.text: The presentation will be followed by a brief <w>QA</w> session.
Please save your inquiries for the <w>QA</w> at the end of the meeting.

senses.sense_definition: An abbreviation for <w>quality assurance</w>, the systematic process of determining whether a product or service meets specified requirements.

examples.text: The <w>QA</w> team found several bugs before the software release.
She works in <w>QA</w> to ensure every product meets the company standards.

senses.sense_definition: An abbreviation for <w>quaternary ammonium</w>, a type of chemical cation often used in disinfectants and surfactants.

examples.text: The laboratory analysis revealed high levels of <w>QA</w> compounds in the sample.
Many modern disinfectants rely on <w>QA</w> to eliminate bacteria effectively.

senses.sense_definition: A member of <w>Queen Alexandra's Royal Army Nursing Corps</w>.

examples.text: The <w>QA</w> tended to the wounded soldiers with great care and professionalism.
She served as a <w>QA</w> in the British Army for over ten years.
